section.p: The system that a complaint seems to affect

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11532 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.140"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11269)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10784)/@code="69468-7" Primary anatomic organ system of chief complaint NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10783)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10786), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet OrganSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.77 DYNAMIC (CONF:10785)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.08
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11269)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10784)/@code="69468-7" Primary anatomic organ system of chief complaint NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10783)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10786), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet OrganSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.77 DYNAMIC (CONF:10785)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.08

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.140"/> <code code="69468-7" displayName="Primary anatomic organ system of chief complaint NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
